Santos.line: Beautiful piece o' work, ain't it, mate? Bax and I labored seven years into this... Magnus, four.

Elliot.line: Wait, Magnus joined late into the project? How does that work?

Santos.line: Yeah, well, we had another fella doing the planning, but him and Bax fell out hard. So he had to leave.

Elliot.line: ...Anyway, I hope yer enjoying the trip! Weâ€™ve still got plenty o' ground to cover, from India to Japan to the 'States, so ya better strap in.
